buginformation.summary: compiler fails find amd module subdirectory
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem create 1st amd module lib foo create 2nd amd module bar depending lib foo try compile both files with bar main module what the expected output what you see instead java jar compiler jar transform amd modules process common modules common entry module bar compilation level advanced optimizations output file out bar lib foo error required entry point quot module lib foo quot never provided error warning make out error what version the product are you using what operating system latest version from trunk including fix for issue 804 please provide any additional information below find minimal not working example attached with makefile the same setup has been working prior fix for 804 although with backslashes this feature does not seem have enough unit test coverage what are you building see the problem fair the code also emitted error before issue 804 was fixed was just worse error this issue was closed revision 2223
